reviews.text: Good location

Worst fast food service I had.
Both burgers in the order were wrong and one was just bread and meat.
When we came back, they throw the burgers in the trash without asking anything and just prepared new ones in 15min without confirming and apologizing

Dobre burgery :)
Sehr saftig ! Frisch zubereitet. schneller Service

Shake shack est de loin les meilleurs burger que lâ€™on puisse trouver dans un fast food, ils sont copieux, gourmand et pas sec du tout ! Je ne pourrai plus manger un autre burger comme Ã§a dommage quâ€™en France nous nâ€™avons pas votre chaÃ®ne de restauration.
De plus le cadre de votre restaurant est superbe !
Ğ’ĞºÑƒÑĞ½Ñ‹Ğµ Ğ±ÑƒÑ€Ğ³ĞµÑ€Ñ‹
Las hamburguesas son muy buenas, no hay refill de bebidas y la atenciÃ³n del personal deja mucho que desear.

I went to this location yesterday and put order via self order. The table number was entered, but the employee yell my name and it took me a minute since I am a senior to get up. My food was left on the counter instead of being delivered to the table. I noticed everyone who came after me, their food was delivered to the . The burger was good

maybe you should stop going to shake shack !
waiting 30min for thisâ€¦ ok for the wait as its a crowded place but dont take the truffle burger, itâ€™s like no truffle and no oignons.
donâ€™t worth $13.
itâ€™s a shame.

(they tried to report my photo of the horrible burger to get it deleted)

Locale pulito e bei tavoli affacciati sulla strada. Solo un bagno disponibile, troppa fila. Panini nello standard della catena. Qui abbiamo preso anche il Dubai milkshake ma non ci Ã¨ sembrato niente di speciale. Sabato poco prima di mezzogiorno i tavoli erano sempre quasi tutti liberi.
SMORES SHAKE IS A 10/10!!!!
Gone down hill
Toujours DÃ©licieux, joli dÃ©cor et bon emplacement

Great place to go. No complaints whatsoever. Love the food, love the service but for the love of god fix that exit door. Every time I am try to eat in peace and someone will exit out it will slam so hard it would jump scare you. Thanks
Food is not so good.

Very dissatisfied with the level of service at this location. They have very long waits, refuse to work as an casher meaning no cash accepted, and very rude workers. Do not order at this location if youâ€™re on a time schedule such as catching the ferry.

Esta cadena de comida rÃ¡pida tiene mucha fama en Nueva York, y me la habÃ­an recomendado. Fuimos a este local del Puente de Brooklyn y nos encantÃ³. El sistema de pedir la comida es por pantalla y luego te llevan la comida a la mesa. La mesa tenÃ­a unas vistas muy buenas del puente. Y por supuesto la comida estÃ¡ muy bien. Otra cosa, habitual en NY, es que puedes beber agua del grifo, cosa que se agradece. En general esta cadena suele estar en sitios muy chulos, lo cual hace que apetezca mÃ¡s ir. Si quieres probar una hamburguesa de una cadena esta no la puedes dejar pasar!!!!

I had take-out (burger & fries)
They forgot my fries (which I had noticed immediately) & it took pretty long until the fries have been ready, so my burger got cold already.
The service is friendly
The restaurant is not very comfortable

Fila molto lunga per arrivare al totem degli ordini e, una volta completato lâ€™ordine, il dispositivo di pagamento non funzionava (probabile causa del rallentamento). Abbiamo dovuto ricompilare tutto direttamente alla cassa, perdendo altro tempo. I panini perÃ² erano molto gustosi. Nota negativa anche per i servizi: delle due toilette una era fuori uso, con conseguente ulteriore attesa prima di andare via.

2000000/10

Jamais dÃ©Ã§u par cette enseigne de burgers ğŸ‘Œ

Iâ€™m very familiar with Shake Shack, and Iâ€™m truly sorry to leave a negative review for one of the restaurants in the chain.
During a quiet evening with few customers, using such old frying oil that turnedâ€¦

Ice machine not working. Warmest soda Iâ€™ve ever had. One bathroom not working , line was ridiculous and they ran out of toilet paper for the single bathroom in use. Franchise should investigate this place. Too much money coming in for this to be happening here !
Did the trick .. quick and tasty - friendly vibe

The worst Shake Shack ever! Super dirty, I was disgusted eating at that table, the waiters were very rude, and the food was far below the standard of the other restaurants in the chain. I want my money back! Iâ€™ve eaten here before, but today was enough, never again.
Hamburguesa de buena carne, todo lo demÃ¡s como cualquier hamburgueserÃ­a de las tÃ­picas de comida rapida
Horrible el lugar. Sucio. BaÃ±os horripilantes. La comida mal presentada. La atenciÃ³n pÃ©sima
Tutto abbastanza buono un po' caro Ã¨ piccolo il panino non esiste il menÃ¹ Ã¨ tutto separato
35percet vÃ¡rtam egy krumplira, nevetsÃ©ges

AprÃ¨s avoir observÃ© le coucher de soleil au Brooklyn Park, lâ€™emplacement est idÃ©al pour dÃ®ner. Le service est rapide et bien organisÃ©, les burgers sont trÃ¨s bons de mÃªme que les milk-shakes. Il y a beaucoup de places assises dans la salle.
Catastrophic service (30 minutes to pick up an order), Guantanamo-like friendliness and incomplete order. The grand slam of incompetence!

Disfrutamos de unas buenas hamburguesas y patatas fritas en esta cadena de hamburguesas famosa de Nueva York. Precios algo elevados contando que las patatas fritas van a parte, pero las hamburguesas estaban muy buenas. La Hamburguesa ronda de los 10 a los 12$ y las patatas sobre los 6-7$. Estaba muy concurrido
Very nice food but very slow i waited 20 minutes just for two cups of soda and very rude why i asked wheres my kids drinks staff are untrained and not nice to the customers
I love the food. It came fast, even though they were busy, but the bathrooms are dirty, definitely  discusting they need to keep up more with that..

Buena hamburgueserÃ­a para ir con jÃ³venes, hamburguesas ricas y pueden rellenar su vaso de bebida cuÃ¡ntas veces quieran. TambiÃ©n tienen agua fresca de grifo.
Hay que hacer el pedido en una mÃ¡quina junto al mostrador y coger nÃºmero para que te lleven el pedido a la mesa, por lo que el servicio no es nada del otro mundo.
Cuando fuimos, solo funcionaba un baÃ±o y se formaron largas colas.

Delicious burgers and fries as expected of Shake Shack. The plus point for this particular eatery was it spacious and not crowded even during lunch time on the weekday we were there. And service was quick!
It's good..ambience is good...and so is food...

Food is tasty
Very crowded

Went on Sunday 07/13/2025 at 5 pm. The air was stuffy. It seems that they didnt have air conditioning. After few minutes they announced that restrooms were not working for the rest of the day. Half of our 4 hamburguers were the wrong ones. One was missing avocado (later they gave it as an extra side). The ketchup dispenser didn't have any ketchup. Few minutes later they screamed that they run out a branded soda. Tea was mostly water. Fries... So so.
Lemonade-strawberry, hamburgers,  and shake were good. They missed a straw. Offered to bring mayo, never arrived. Personell very corteous.
BuenÃ­simo. La comida espectacular y el trato por parte del servicio muy bueno.

ğŸŒŸğŸŒŸğŸŒŸğŸŒŸğŸŒŸ 5/5 â€“ Classic Comfort with a View!

We had an amazing experience at the Shake Shack Dumbo location â€” honestly, everything about it hit the spot and made our day in Brooklyn even better.

First off, you canâ€™t beat the location. Nestled right in the heart of Dumbo, just steps from the waterfront and the iconic views of the Manhattan Bridge â€” itâ€™s the perfect place to stop for a bite while exploring the area. The atmosphere here is casual but lively, and you really feel like youâ€™re part of the NYC energy â€” tourists and locals all mingling, enjoying good food with great vibes.
